data.question: What does the comfyui-menu-anchor extension do?
data.answer: The comfyui-menu-anchor extension moves the ComfyUI menu to the specified corner on startup.

data.question: Why might someone need the comfyui-menu-anchor extension?
data.answer: If you install a bunch of Extensions that add buttons to the menu, half of the buttons may be out of the screen on launch. The comfyui-menu-anchor extension solves this issue by moving the menu to the specified corner.

data.question: How can I configure the comfyui-menu-anchor extension?
data.answer: You can edit the 'configs.js' file to set which of the 4 corners to stick to, and also to make the menu always stick to the corner.
